str2: Accusative case of charis as preposition; through favor of, i.e. On account of.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
